description: Product of first n palindromic primes plus 1.
comments: The subsequence of those values which are themselves primes begins: 3, 7, 31, 211, 2311, 6575388435279972570571 [Jonathan Vos Post, Feb 09 2011]
author: _Felice Russo_
extensions: Corrected and extended by _Patrick De Geest_, 09/2000.
